title: Verify Broker patron can acquire the active ticket from another Broker and verify the ticket status in both the accounts

custom_steps_separated.content:
1.     Pre-requisite:  PV  1.Login to PV and navigates to AFP     2.Ticket Acquire Actions Allowed should be true   in Ticket Permissions AFP                                                                                   3.Market permissions for Acqurie setting should   be in AFP   4.Patron Market permission should be set      5.Create a Master Event       5.Acquire access should be set in master event   access                                    6.Configure a Broker Patron and associate it to   Apigee user  7.Complete a sale transaction through PV/MPV   using the broker patron    
2.     Login in to MPV using the Broker Patron1.    
3.     From the Hamburg menu select Buy ticket.    
4.     Selet an event and choose tickets from the event.    
5.     Click add to cart and enter all details and complete the transaction.    
6.     Launch Rest Client Tool    
7.     Load AcquireTickets V2 API    
8.     Provide all required parameter including (Broker   Patron2)Account ID and ticket barcode    
9.     Run the request    
10.      Login in to MPV using the Broker Patron 2   Account details    
11.     Verify the GetTicketAPI call and the forward_status is displayed as "Acquired"    
12.     Goto Inventory    
13.     Verify the Status of the acquired ticket is   "ACQUIRED FROM: ACCOUNT NAME "     
14.     Logout and Login as Broker Patron 1    
15.     Go to Invnetory.Verify the Status of ticket is "ACQUIRED BY ACCOUNT NAME "     
16.     Login to PV     
17.     Navigates to order details  for financial patron     
18.     Verify ACQUIRED and PULLED status in delivery tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1.     Prerequisite should be met    
2.     Login should be successful.    
3.     Event list page should be displayed.    
4.     Tickets should be selected.    
5.     Order should be placed successfully.    
6.     Rest Client Tool should be launched successfully    
7.     AcquireTickets V2 API should be loaded    
8.     All required parameter including Broker Patron2   account id and ticket barcode should be provided        
9.     Request should be run    
10.     Broker Patron2 should be logged in successfully    
11.     The forward_status should be displayed as "Acquired" in the GetTicketAPI call    
12.     Inventory should be displayed    
13.     The Status of the acquired ticket should be   "ACQUIRED FROM: ACCOUNT NAME "     
14.     Broker Patron 1 should be logged in.    
15.     Status of ticket is "ACQUIRED BY ACCOUNT NAME "     
16.     Login should be successful.    
17.     Order details should be displayed.    
18.      ACQUIRED and PULLED status should be displayed in delivery tab

title: Verify a new user is able to complete the transaction with upsell event via seat map flow
Verify an existing user is able to complete the transaction with upsell event via section map flow
Verify completing a MasterPass transaction by adding another event by clicking on Continue shopping from Shopping cart
Verify creating and purchasing an offer with split logic as Multiples of 2 via bank account
Verify creating and purchasing an offer with split logic as Sell all tickets togther, no splits via account credit
Verify that user is able to complete transaction with coupon protected buyer type and normal buyer type in accessible seating flow, when Show only coupon eligible areas is unchecked
Verify user is able to recall the forward tickes after adding a friend in manage friends page
Verify an existing user is able to complete the transaction with a multilist package after adding a singlelist package
